news.title: Desert Water Conservation and Management Strategies
news.content: Rajasthan High Court mandates comprehensive water conservation strategies for desert regions, emphasizing rainwater harvesting, groundwater management, and sustainable water usage practices across the state.

news.title: Tourism Heritage Sites Protection Framework
news.content: The court establishes protective framework for Rajasthan's heritage tourism sites, balancing tourist access with historical preservation and local community benefits.

news.title: Solar Energy Projects Environmental Compliance
news.content: Rajasthan High Court directs strict environmental compliance for solar energy projects, ensuring minimal land use impact and community consultation in renewable energy development.
